devices.description: This device can control the switch of the living room lights and adjust the brightness and color of the living room lights.
This device can control the power switch, channel and volume of the living room television.
This device can control the audio player in the living room to adjust the volume, play and stop music.
This device can control the opening and closing of the curtains in the living room and adjust their position
This device can control the air conditioner switch in the living room, set the temperature and mode
This device can control the switch of the master_bedroom lights and adjust the brightness and color of the master_bedroom lights.
This device can control the air conditioner switch in the master bedroom, set the temperature and mode
This device can control the opening and closing of the curtains in the master bedroom and adjust their position
This device can control the switch of the guest bedroom lights and adjust the brightness and color of the guest_bedroom lights.
This device can control the air conditioner switch in the guest badroom, set the temperature and mode
This device can control the opening and closing of the curtains in the guest bedroom and adjust their position
This device can control the switch of the kitchen lights and adjust the brightness and color of the kitchen lights.
This device can control the switch of the bathroom lights and adjust the brightness and color of the bathroom lights.
